title: Ranked thoughts

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So i would like to know if this has happened to anybody else...

Recently just had a game of ranked, where our jungler went afk at level 4. 

Now i had a 7-1 lead by this time and i was snowballing hard. We did quite well and ended up winning the 4 v 5 at 50 minutes. 

Now i want to know after ending on about 18-11, and being 4 v 5 why on earth my team and i got 9/10 LP and the enemy got loss prevented? 

Pretty {{champion:157}}  in my opinion

replies.body:
Hey there,

Judging from the time of your post this was probably around the time when all regions were experiencing issues relating to the login queue.

Ranked was disabled at this time and loss prevented was enabled as a precautionary measure as the exact scope of the issue was unknown.
Oh.. Okay i see... Still a bit ridiculous!
